original_text: And his disciples say unto him, Whence should we have so much bread in the wilderness, as to fill so great a multitude?
korean_text: 제자들이 이르되 광야에 있어 우리가 어디서 이런 무리가 배부를 만큼 떡을 얻으리이까

sentences.original_text: And his disciples say unto him,
Whence should we have so much bread
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 어디서 이렇게 많은 빵을 얻겠습니까

sentences.original_text: as to fill so great a multitude?
